name: The Underworld (mahrens1)
description:
Enter the land of the dead, if you dare. The inhabitants there aren't exactly what you may think. There's animals, Wardens, and people who just don't care about helping you find your friend. That wont stop you though. No matter what it takes, you will find him and bring him home, to the land of the living.

The game features a small quest to rescue your friend from the clutches of Death, ruler of the Underworld. Follow the instructions of those you meet to get clues as to where your friend is. Explore the a small town in the Underworld. Meet its high ranking officials and try not to get lost like the rest of the decaying souls. Listen to what everyone has to say and get a sense of how miserable the end is.
